short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly save web pages as MHTML files. Organize and access your saved pages anytime seamlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture and store your favorite web pages with the Save as MHTML Chrome extension. With just one click, save any webpage as a clean MHTML file, complete with the URL, viewing timestamp, and accessible for later use. Organize and manage your saved files easily, with a user-friendly interface that lets you view, download, or delete entries. Experience seamless browsing and archiving like never before!
